info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 11:55PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Buffalo and southern Sherman Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Poole, or 19 miles northeast of Kearney, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ravenna around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rockville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for south central and central Nebraska.
